articles.author: Kathryn Shattuck
articles.title: Joseph Fiennes Loved the ‘Catharsis’ of the ‘Handmaid’s Tale’ Finale
articles.description: In an interview, the actor discussed the end of Season 4, the future of the show and the emotional toll of playing “an ugly, pathetic, misogynist monster.”
articles.content:
Is that enough to bring about redemption?
No, Fred is a repeat offender an ugly, pathetic, misogynist monster that will never change. I felt like Fred wouldnt redeem himself in the way that we want … [+1580 chars]

articles.author: Alix Strauss
articles.title: Meet the Hindu Priest Officiating L.G.B.T.Q. Weddings
articles.description: Sushma Dwivedi offers nuptials and other religious services to underserved people.
articles.content: As a Hindu pundit, or priest, who focuses on the L.G.B.T.Q. population, Sushma Dwivedi is a rarity in the wedding industry. Its close to impossible to find a woman pundit here in the States, she said… [+1322 chars]

articles.description: The vote, mostly along party lines, came after Republicans blocked the creation of an independent panel to scrutinize the assault. President Biden vowed action to help Western states battling wildfires.
